Optional Colorrr Premium subscription. You can subscribe and pay through your iTunes account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage your subscriptions by entering the user settings in iTunes after the purchase. Auto-renew may also be turned off from here. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchase.

Relax and create new stunning artworks. And don\'t forget to share it with community!
We didn\'t see you for a long time, maybe its time to create some new artwork?
We have a lot of updates since you last visit and we\'re eager for your new artworks!
Take a short tour to better\nunderstand the application!

On this screen you\'ll see all available for coloring collections and images. Filter collections by different criterias and discover featured collections. Start coloring any image you like by tapping it in the list. If you\'re already started coloring selected image before you\'ll able to continue it, start over, create duplicate or share it with friends of Colorrr community.

Main screen of the app where you\'ll create your artworks. Select color from dozens of builtin palettes or create your own with any colors you may need. Change fill type from solid color to different gradients and textures. Select gradient or texture angle by holding image and rotating preview. And once ready just tap image to fill some region. You\'re always can undo or redo your steps or restart image from scratch using buttons located in top bar. Tap \"Done\" once your artwork finished to publish it!

Feed of all works published by Colorrr users. Share your own artworks with community to get feedback, discover other user\'s works, comment and like it, or repaint any image you like. Follow users you\'re like to get personalized feed of works. Also you can explore all user\'s works by tapping profile picture in any feed item.

By opening someone\'s profile you\'ll able to see all published works by this user. Also you\'ll able to check all followers or all followed users to find interesting artists and get inspiration for your future works!

You\'re also have your own profile screen. Here you\'ll able to find all images you have started coloring before as well as all published works. You will be able to manage your followers and users you\'re following. Finally you always able to edit your profile in the app.

We\'re can\'t wait to see that you\'ll create with Colorrr. Now relax, select any image you\'re like and start creating something new! If you have some questions or need any assistance - just use \"Email Us\" item in Settings screen and our support team will be happy to help you. And remember - everyone can be an artist!
